data.name: RPGScenery - Light Forest Scene
data.detailed_description:
Stepping out of the woods, a huge clearing unfolds before your eyes, split in two by a quietly trickling stream. On one side of the stream rises a small hill densely overgrown with trees, which promises an excellent view from their top. For a moment you marvel at the pattern of the stones that break the monotony of the clearing, then ...

This DLC contains 3 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level

data.short_description: Stepping out of the woods, a huge clearing unfolds before your eyes, split in two by a quietly trickling stream. This DLC contains 3 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level

  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
